name: Cave Dash (Innocent Sakala)
description:
A platformer about an unnamed caveman who loves gems so much as to delve deep in caves to find em. Only problem is... He hates the dark.

DEVELOPER'S NOTE:

I made this game for the #IndieWorldOrder #CaveJam and I may or may not develop this game further for it is just bare bones right now.

Feedback is highly appreciated. ✌

ACTIONKEY

RUN LEFTLEFT ARROWRUN RIGHTRIGHT ARROWJUMPZ OR UP ARROWTHROW ROCKXPAUSE/PLAYESC OR PFULLSCREEN TOGGLEENTER OR F
